techmeme.title: Live blog: The US Supreme Court hears oral arguments in TikTok's appeal against the divest-or-ban law (Wired)
Sources: Venu's cancellation came after the companies decided it was better to avoid the risk of an extended lawsuit that could jeopardize bundling in general (CNBC)
Sources: Chinese hackers breached CFIUS, the US government office that reviews foreign investments for national security risks (Sean Lyngaas/CNN)
The CFPB proposes a new rule to give consumers the same protection rights when they use virtual currencies in some video games like Roblox as when they use USD (Makena Kelly/Wired)
Disney, Fox, and WBD say they have agreed to discontinue their Venu Sports streaming joint venture and will focus on existing products and distribution channels (Alex Weprin/The Hollywood Reporter)
